definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The government also said it would distribute potassium iodide pills to those near the plant.
sentences.chinese: 政府也聲稱它將爲核電站附近的人們分發碘化鉀片。

sentences.english: Many of these cases would have been prevented if potassium iodide had been provided at the appropriate time.
sentences.chinese: 很多病例都是可以防止的，只要能夠及時提供碘化鉀。

sentences.english: Can pregnant women take potassium iodide pills?
sentences.chinese: 孕婦可以服用碘化鉀藥片嗎？

sentences.english: Oh, I thought it stands for a certain chemical substance KISS.
sentences.chinese: 哇，我還以爲那是化學上二硫碘化鉀的代稱。

sentences.english: The World Health Organization (WHO) warns against the indiscriminate use of potassium iodide as a precaution against nuclear radiation.
sentences.chinese: 世界衛生組織警告民衆不要亂用碘化鉀來防範核輻射。
